types.name: Black Galaxy
types.description: Premium black granite with gold and copper speckles. Ideal for countertops, flooring, and luxury interior designs.

types.name: Tan Brown
types.description: Dark brown granite with black and chestnut tones. Suitable for countertops, stairs, and indoor flooring.

types.name: Absolute Black
types.description: Solid black granite with a uniform texture, known for its elegance and durability in kitchens and commercial spaces.
applications: Bathroom vanities and minimalist interior designs
